mapper.select: SELECT t.`RESUME_ID` AS resumeId, t.`NAME`, t.`SEX`, t.`TEL`, t.`WORK_YEAR` AS workYear, t.`EDUCATION`, t.`REMARK` FROM basis_tb_resume t WHERE t.state = 'U'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_resume ( USER_ID, NAME, SEX, TEL, WORK_YEAR, EDUCATION, REMARK, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{tel}, #{workYear}, #{education}, #{remark}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
mapper.update: UPDATE basis_tb_resume t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #{modifyUser}, t.`NAME` = #{name}, t.`SEX` = #{sex}, t.`TEL` = #{tel}, t.`WORK_YEAR` = #{workYear}, t.`EDUCATION` = #{education}, t.`REMARK` = #{remark} WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.resume_id = #{resumeId}
